Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2010 10:14PM noblegases wrote: You are still kicking. Thats what we look for as stage 4 people...are we still kicking? Now the brain thing brings up some medical ethical question...you may not want to tell everyone you know.

Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2010 08:45PM noblegases wrote: If you are a complete stranger to this woman, explain to your sister the difference in stages and threactions people have had on the boards. Support your sister as she goes through this process with her friend.
Posts.Title: How do I deal with this???? scrappy_survivor noblegases

Posts.Content: noblegases wrote: I've had over 40 chemotherapy infusions as well as additional Arredia and Zometa. My teeth roots are turning black. I am now on Xempra. Does anyone have similar experience. I do drink a lot of diluted organic grape juice and chew marijuana. But I think it is the chemo. Dx IDC, 2cm, Stage IV, Grade 2, 0/5 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
